name: Roast Beef, Pickle, and Horseradish Smørrebrød (Danish Open-Faced Sandwich)
description: The combination of chewy meat, crunchy pickles, and shredded horseradish give this smørrebrød (Danish open-faced sandwich) an irresistible blend of textures. To keep things simple, this recipe calls for prepared roast beef and bottled horseradish.
recipeIngredient: 1 slice rugbrød (dense Danish sourdough rye bread), about 1/3-inch thick
1/8 pound sliced roast beef, cut into about 6 (1-inch) squares
Thinly sliced red onion, to garnish

recipeInstructions.text: If not already trimmed, cut rye bread to a 3- by 5-inch rectangle.
Spread butter evenly all over top side of bread.
Arrange roast beef on butter, covering the surface evenly. Sprinkle cornichons and sliced red onion on top. Finish with a dollop of horseradish in the center. Serve right away.
